images.alt_text: AI-selected This image will highlight Milan's unique aspects during autumn, showcasing fashion week, art districts, and culinary delights.

assetRequirements.purpose: main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of Milan in autumn
assetRequirements.visual_style: vibrant and warm, reflecting autumn colors and urban chic
assetRequirements.content_context: A scenic view of Milan showcasing autumn foliage, cozy cafes, and fashion elements.

assetRequirements.purpose: to highlight the autumn experience in Milan
assetRequirements.visual_style: soft and warm tones, featuring autumn leaves and local cuisine
assetRequirements.content_context: Images of autumn leaves, local dishes, and stylish city scenes.

usageInstructions.placement: Place according to campaign layout requirements
usageInstructions.context: Use in context of: Откройте для себя Милан этой осенью!. Ensure asset aligns with brand guidelines and campaign messaging.
usageInstructions.responsiveBehavior: Scale proportionally for mobile devices. Ensure minimum readable size on small screens.
usageInstructions.accessibilityRequirements: Ensure alt text is provided: "AI-selected This image will highlight Milan's unique aspects during autumn, showcasing fashion week, art districts, and culinary delights.". Alt text should be descriptive and convey the image's purpose in the email context.
usageInstructions.fallbackStrategy: If image fails to load, display alt text with appropriate background color
